name: Experience a Day Tour in Hanoi
description:
Families with children wanting to experience Charming Hanoi, the little Paris of the Orient, maybe looking for a more relaxing tour that incorporates more activities for the younger members of the party, and more green spaces than city riding, or just a hup on- hup off tour.

For this reason I have built a special Family Hanoi program. In this program we focus mostly on the northern part of the city where we can ride a cyclo 9 traditional bicycle riding) , visit a petting zoo, visit Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and Garden 9 very peaceful place), and end up at with a street foods in Hanoi, ir perhaps a restaurant of your choice 9 of course with my recommendation)
